name: Into the Matrix
description:
Welcome, player.

Your assignment: Descend to the heart of the Matrix, and destroy The Core.

Enclosed are two pills, one red and one blue. Take the blue pill, and your life continues as usual. Take the red one, and you might just save humanity.

And don't forget, you'll need guns. Lots of guns.

Programming and Game Design by Sora & awerar

3D Models by malte-hedenstrom

Testing and feedback from Pyrrhus
